Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
Server is the main server class

    Adds a client to a corrisponding waiting list according to the number of players he wants to play with

    Removes the nickname from the nickname list

    Removes a player from a match, removes the nickname from the list of nicknames, resets the gameID to -1, which stands for invalid match

    • PORT

      public final int PORT

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server() throws java.io.IOException
      Is the constructor of the Server
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if socket cannot be created

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Accepts new players connecting to the server and creates a connection to speak and deal with them

    • lobby

      public void lobby​(int numberOfPlayers, ServerConnection client)
      Adds a client to a corrisponding waiting list according to the number of players he wants to play with
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - chosen by the client (2 or 3)
      client - ServerConnection of the client

    • createMatch

      public void createMatch​(int gameID, int numberOfPlayers, ServerConnection challenger)
      Creates a new match
      Parameters:
      gameID - match identifier
      numberOfPlayers - indicates the number of players of the match
      challenger - ServerConnection of the client, which creates the new match

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer​(int gameID, ServerConnection player)
      Adds a player to an existing match
      Parameters:
      gameID - the identifier of the match
      player - Server connection of the player
      Returns:
      return true if the client has been correctly added to the match

    • addNickname

      public void addNickname​(java.lang.String name)
      Adds a new nickname to the nicknames' list
      Parameters:
      name - nickname to add

    • existingNickname

      public boolean existingNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Checks if the nickname is already used on server
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname to check
      Returns:
      true if the nickname is already used

    • removeNickname

      public void removeNickname​(java.lang.String nameToRemove)
      Removes the nickname from the nickname list
      Parameters:
      nameToRemove - the name to remove

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(int gameID)
      Starts a match
      Parameters:
      gameID - match identifier of the match to start

    • checkMatch

      public boolean checkMatch​(int gameID)
      Checks if a match has reached the number of players it needs to start
      Parameters:
      gameID - match to check
      Returns:
      true if the match corresponding to the gameID is ready to start

    • endMatch

      public void endMatch​(int gameID, ServerConnection closingPlayer)
      Closes a match and sends a closing message to all the clients of the match
      Parameters:
      gameID - match identifier
      closingPlayer - null if there is a winner, else is the player who has left the game

    • removeFromWaitingList

      public void removeFromWaitingList​(ServerConnection toRemove)
      Removes a client from a waiting list if it ends its connection
      Parameters:
      toRemove - ServerConnection of the client toRemove

    • removePlayerFromMatch

      public void removePlayerFromMatch​(int gameID, ServerConnection toRemove)
      Removes a player from a match, removes the nickname from the list of nicknames, resets the gameID to -1, which stands for invalid match
      Parameters:
      gameID - match identifier
      toRemove - ServerConnection of the client to remove

    • getCurrMatch

      public int getCurrMatch()
      Returns:
      the ID if the last match created

    • updateCurrMatch

      public void updateCurrMatch()
      Updates the currMatch ID
